labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!039 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Hong Kong', 'Irlanda', 'Giappone', 'Industriale', 'Tecnologia'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Hong Kong']

AssertionError: Bug#039. Expected result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are displayed ['Gran Bretagna', 'Svezia']
Actual result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are not displayed after selecting an item from the "Most traded" dropdown ['Gran Bretagna', 'Olanda', 'Svezia', 'ETF', 'Servizi di pubblica utilit√†']
